import './Listing.scss' import Modal from "react-modal"; export default function Listing({poems}) { console.log('incoming poems', poems) return (<> {poems?.map((poems, i) => { console.log('mapped poems', poems) return (<> ) })}
# Title Author Poems Poem Details
{i + 1} {poems?.title} {poems?.author} {poems?.lines?.slice(0, 5)} -...
I am a modal
) }
